= WholeLifeIndividual

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|Class

|Name
|WholeLifeIndividual

|IRI
|http://www.ontology.asam.net/Core#WholeLifeIndividual

|Subclass of
|State

|Comments
|DEF: A State that is not a proper temporalPartOf any other individual of the same kind.

EXAMPLES:

USAGE: Use this class in combination with others to designate that a particular spatio-temporal extent is "its whole life"

link:http://www.informationjunction.co.uk/hqdm_framework/hqdm_framework/lexical/individual.htm[Reference to HQDM individual]
